body:
This could probably be simplified with [`.update()`](https://facebook.github.io/immutable-js/docs/#/Map/update).

Something like this maybe?

```js
return state.updateIn('experiments', new List(), experiments => experiments.filter(e => e.get('experiment_slug !== slug)));
body_html:
This could probably be simplified with .update().

Something like this maybe?

return state.updateIn('experiments', new List(), experiments => experiments.filter(e => e.get('experiment_slug !== slug)));
